attributes.additional_details:
Delivery charges made to NI residents are always more than our UK counterparts.

Most websites and e-retailers state that they exclude NI and Scottish Highlands from standard delivery, therefore we must pay higher charges. Even when a free delivery option is available a free is still applied

However most still use Royal Mail to delivery packages.

I would like to government to look into this to make one standard delivery fair for all. If the like of Amazon, Play etc. can provide a service to all of the UK no matter what location surely other companies can do the same.
